value:
I'm impressed by the commander of
this Order of Heroes here—a keen
mind for one still in her bloom.

I was the caretaker for my liege
Corrin for many years. So rather than
a retainer, I'm more a parent.

I admire your initiative doing patrols.
We should trade stories over tea.
I'm no butler, but I can brew the stuff.

My lifetime of training served me well
in my world. Will it in this one?$k$pMaybe I should train with you
ranking members of this order.

I maintain my armor often. When I got
here, I had little more than that on me.
So I have to take good care of it all.

Hmm, I take it that you are
$Nu.$k$pThen I've finally found you. I bring
greetings from your friend
$Nf.
It feels good to be in action again!
Guess I can learn new tricks...

At my age, I'm lucky I don't feel
weaker.

A lot of power for an old man.
But I'll use it as best I can.

I am Gunter, a knight of Nohr. Some
might call me too old. Their mistake.
This knight is a seasoned veteran!

I heard from your commander
that you're a...Great Hero.$k$pCome now—out with it. Are you
a Great Hero? Perhaps you're too
humble to say as much.$k$pYou might not have my years,
but embrace who you are and
develop your potential!$k$pThat weapon of yours—make
yourself into the sort of person
who is worthy of holding it!$k$pI have known another one in my
days who faced a similar
dilemma.$k$pNow, before you dismiss this as
the ramblings of an old man,
know this:$k$pI have also sensed it while we've
been in battle—a gap between your
title and your confidence.$k$pNo need to apologize. It's only
natural, and it's also where
I come in.$k$pLet this veteran fight for you a bit
longer. I offer my sword and my years,
until you are great inside and out.
せい
でやっ！
くっ…
うおおっ！？
I will have my revenge!
I will cut you down.
This ends now.
A grave mistake.
Careless...
Yes?
Others might trifle with me, but I suspect you won't make that mistake.
I find you...intriguing...to say the least.
I am glad to have joined you.
Remain focused. Always—not just on the battlefield.
Curious about the scar on my face? Hmm. Of course you are.
My armor has known...so much blood.
You and I should spar sometime. Builds character!
Hmm?
Hmm.
Let's go.
